verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <S%H4427><s%> Ma-loch reigneth יִרְגְּז֣וּ <S%H7264><s%> yir-ge-Zu tremble עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim; let the people יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev he sitteth כְּ֝רוּבִ֗ים <S%H3742><s%> ke-ru-Vim, [between] the cherubims תָּנ֥וּט <S%H5120><s%> ta-Nut be moved הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. let the earth

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon in Zion גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; [is] great וְרָ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> ve-Ram and he [is] high ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> Ha-'am-Mim. above all the people

יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du Let them praise שִׁ֭מְךָ <S%H8034><s%> me-cha name גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol thy great וְנוֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> ve-no-Ra, and terrible קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh [for] it [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְעֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> ve-'Oz strength מֶלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> me-leCh The king's מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat judgment אָ֫הֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hev also loveth אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah You כּוֹנַ֣נְתָּ <S%H3559><s%> ko-Nan-ta thou dost establish מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> mei-sha-Rim; equity מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat judgment וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah, and righteousness בְּיַעֲקֹ֤ב׀ <S%H3290><s%> be-ya-'a-Ko in Jacob אַתָּ֬ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta. thou executest

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <S%H7311><s%> rom-Mu Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ <S%H7812><s%> Ve-hish-ta-cha-vu and worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <S%H1916><s%> la-ha-Dom stool רַגְלָ֗יו <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lav, be able to endure קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh [for] he [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן׀ <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron and Aaron בְּֽכֹהֲנָ֗יו <S%H3548><s%> be-cho-ha-Nav, among his priests וּ֭שְׁמוּאֵל <S%H8050><s%> U-she-mu-'el and Samuel בְּקֹרְאֵ֣י <S%H7121><s%> be-ko-re-'Ei among them that call שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo; upon his name קֹרִ֥אים <S%H7121><s%> ko-Rim they called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- upon יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh upon the LORD וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and He יַעֲנֵֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Nem. and he answered

בְּעַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> be-'am-Mud pillar עָ֭נָן <S%H6051><s%> 'A-non unto them in the cloudy יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber He spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; about שָׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Ru they kept עֵ֝דֹתָ֗יו <S%H5713><s%> 'e-do-Tav, his testimonies וְחֹ֣ק <S%H2706><s%> ve-Chok and the ordinance נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> na-tan- [that] he gave לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵינוּ֮ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Nu our God אַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You עֲנִ֫יתָ֥ם <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ni-Tam Thou answeredst אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el thou wast a God נֹ֭שֵׂא <S%H5375><s%> No-se that forgavest הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta become לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem; to them וְ֝נֹקֵ֗ם <S%H5358><s%> ve-no-Kem, them though thou tookest vengeance עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5949><s%> a-li-lo-Tam. of their inventions

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <S%H7311><s%> rom-Mu Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God וְ֭הִֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ <S%H7812><s%> Ve-hish-ta-cha-vu and worship לְהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> le-Har hill קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho; at his holy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh, [is] holy יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God
